attributes.review: i downloaded this app under the impression there would be lots of fun games and things to do. however, i was VERY MISTAKEN. this app is boring af and all it does is spam you with texts and take all of your personal information. there are no games or fun activities or anything. Please guys this app is horrible 😣😭.
